episode.title: Deliberately Churned
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Christina Warren returns to the show to talk about the drama at Disney, tumult at Twitter, and how the hell to score Taylor Swift tickets.
episode.showNotes:
Christina Warren returns to the show to talk about the drama at Disney, tumult at Twitter, and how the hell to score Taylor Swift tickets.
